entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stewart
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stewart Airport 12:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: E 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
